analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/23/0x2ac91c25bbf0214a9fa2288b9baf30f1e8e39ab1.sol:
	Contract NUToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/23/0x2ac91c25bbf0214a9fa2288b9baf30f1e8e39ab1.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

NUToken.retreiveTokens (/unique_chucks/23/0x2ac91c25bbf0214a9fa2288b9baf30f1e8e39ab1.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenInstance.transfer(owner,tokenBalance) (/unique_chucks/23/0x2ac91c25bbf0214a9fa2288b9baf30f1e8e39ab1.sol)

Token.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/23/0x2ac91c25bbf0214a9fa2288b9baf30f1e8e39ab1.sol#197)
